docs.snippet: The rebel States of Alabama, Mississippi, Louisiana, Texas, Arkansas and Tennessee, according to the official reports of their departments, have put in the field 140,000 men. Of these troops there are about 59,000 in Virginia, mostly in Gen....

headline.main: The Navigation of the Ohio Threatened.

docs.lead_paragraph: The rebel States of Alabama, Mississippi, Louisiana, Texas, Arkansas and Tennessee, according to the official reports of their departments, have put in the field 140,000 men. Of these troops there are about 59,000 in Virginia, mostly in Gen. BEAUREGARD'S Army.
